block.field:
Alerts the names and IDs of all sequences
(and multicam clips) of the active project.
You need these IDs if you want to import
a sequence (or multicam clip) into another
 project.
Use this script to figure out the IDs.

shadow.field:
(function () {
 var project = app.project;
 var sequences = project.sequences;

 if (sequences && sequences.numSequences > 0) {
 var msg = "Sequences in Project:

";

 for (var i = 0; i < sequences.numSequences; i++) {
 var seq = sequences[i];
 msg += "Name: " + seq.name + "
";
 msg += "ID: " + seq.sequenceID + "

";
 }

 alert(msg);
 } else {
 alert("No sequences found in this project.");
 }
})();
